      • nextGuess

        public static char nextGuess(char[] guessed,
                             char[] checked,
                             java.lang.String wordlist)
        Function that predicts the next most likely character of a word based on a wordlist and a list of the most frequently used English characters
        Parameters:
        guessed - Char array with already known characters
        checked - Char array with already checked characters
        wordlist - The Word List that should be used (10000|100000|460000|1000000)
        Returns:
        The character that is most likely to fill a blank

        Parameters:
